name: Space Monsters meet THE HARDY
overview: Your task is to find and neutralize the head of space monsters that is hiding in the labyrinths of numerous levels. There are special elevators to go between them, from each of which you will first have to find a key. But not everything is so simple: both are well guarded. And in addition to the monsters themselves, you will find many obstacles of varying degrees of difficulty: from completely harmless, but blocking the way bubbles to deadly drops that kill the first time. But the main enemy is time, inexorably decreasing with every second ... In your arsenal there is only a laser pistol and faithful fast legs. Hurry up! Good luck!
